movies.title: B.T.K. Killer
movies.plot: The B.T.K. killer harasses a news reporter with threatening letters as he ponders about the murders he committed 30 years ago.
movies.simplePlot: The B.T.K. killer harasses a news reporter with threatening letters as he ponders about the murders he committed 30 years ago.

biography.bio: Gerard was born and raised in St Louis MO. Moved to LA in the late 90s. He has been studying acting and working towards his goals in TV & film ever since. Some highlights are Master & Commander: The Far Side Of The World.(uncredited-but plenty of pics to prove it!) The work lasted 5 months and shot at Fox Studios Baja. He played the role of the Sgt. of the Royal Marines. This included 2 weeks of "boot camp" before principal photography began. He had the luxury of watching both Russell Crowe & Paul Bettany work for the entire shoot. Russell once told him he was "A consummate professional". He has taken those words to heart ever since. He also had the opportunity early on to play Fingers The Pirate in Spongebob Squarepants: The Movie. His latest role in a film called Cade, has him playing a father that has recently lost his son to suicide and attempts to bring him back to life through A.I. In his spare time, he is an avid trad rock climber and loves elevation backpacking.
biography.name: Gerard Griesbaum

biography.bio: Eric Gerleman is an actor, known for B.T.K. Killer (2005), Hamlet's Ghost (2015) and New Alcatraz (2001).
biography.name: Eric Gerleman

biography.bio: Victoria Ullmann is an actress, known for Zombie Nation (2004), The Tomb (2007) and Behind the Curtain (2005).
biography.name: Victoria Ullmann

biography.bio: Shyla Fernandes is an actress, known for Zombie Nation (2004) and B.T.K. Killer (2005).
biography.name: Shyla Fernandes

biography.bio: She was born in Bellevue Washington. Her grandmother introduced her to the world of acting in her tavern, singing and dancing with her sister and cousins. When Ron Howard and Mickey Rourke came to shoot a movie on her grandparents house in Issaquah, Washington, she was given her first film role. This experience brought the light to what she wanted to do for the rest of her life. Danielle came to Los Angeles and was having a hard time even getting an audition. As time passed her by, she decided that the Indy movie market might be the way to help open doors. As time keeps ticking by, she seems to be getting closer and closer to her dream. Doors are opening and she's got the chops to close them behind her. Danielle is someone you might want to keep an eye out for in the near future.
biography.name: Danielle Petty

biography.bio: One of the rare actors who both grew up and trained in L.A., Jason is one of those people who is driven by an insatiable desire to achieve the most out of life. As a youngster, Jason found a love for the game of Hockey and quickly excelled as an exceptional student and Hockey player. While playing semi-pro Ice Hockey, he began studying Acting. The passion he developed for Acting and his desire to be a working Actor quickly consumed him and he decided to put all his focus and energy into achieving this goal. Jason is a charismatic person with a rich life story. He has lived and traveled throughout the U.S. and Canada, as well as Europe. He has already earned his Bachelor's and Masters Degree from the University Of Southern California, graduating at the top of his Grad School class. He studied the Meisner Technique at the Wayne C. Dvorak Studios. He also trained at The Groundlings Improv Comedy Studios in L.A. and is continuing his training with renowned Acting Coach, Stuart K. Robinson. Jason's acting debut came in 2004 when he appeared on NBC for the 2004 Olympics Special held at Dodgers Stadium. Soon after, he was signed-on to Star in the breakout Indie Feature "Diary Of A Demise" which began production in the summer of 2006 and completed filming in 2007. In 2007, "Diary Of A Demise" was accepted to the 2007 Cutting Edge Film Festival. 2008 was a busy year for Jason. He signed on with Rich Smith at Brady, Brannon & Rich and shot a number of short films. Jason has a commercial airing Nationally through May 2009. He is in the "Click It Or Ticket" commercial titled "Stuck With A Ticket", where he is not wearing his seat belt and being chased by many pink citations and ultimately ends up "stuck" all over with tickets. In June 2009, Jason can be seen on Season 2 of the TV series "Call 911", where he plays an escaped convict who takes an elderly couple hostage in their home.
biography.name: Yannis Bariamis
